attributes.action: As promised less than two years ago, serve a full third term.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM promised the nation he would fight the 2005 general election and serve a full third term. The nation voted for his government on this basis. He must fulfil his pledge and remain in office until the the next general elections.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
